pay_mode_disp_code as pay_mode_disp_code, pay_mode_name as pay_mode_name, pa_disp_code as pa_disp_code, pa_name as pa_name, input_date as input_date, pay_date as pay_date, accessory_number as clear_date as clear_date, pay_type as pay_type, inputdate as inputdate, bank_id as bank_id, settle_type as settle_type, iniaid as iniaid, isexigence as isexigence, gkdm as gkdm, bank_num as bank_num, acct_type as acct_type, payback_flag as payback_flag, budget_srcid as budget_srcid, btype_id as btype_id, is_pay as is_pay, liq_status as liq_status, liq_date as liq_date, liq_flag as liq_flag, ag_serial as ag_serial, tx_code as tx_code, tx_date as tx_date, tx_time as tx_time, tx_teller as tx_teller, tx_checker as tx_checker, prt_times as prt_times, send_flag as send_flag, note as note, report_flag as report_flag,
FROM gk_pay a where 1 = 1
